sect2.title: Known bugs
sect2.para: Known bugs are available on Bugzilla summary page.
If you find some new bug in &prodname;, you are welcome to open it by pointing your favorite browser to Bugzilla web site.

formalpara.title: #616532 Directory selection
formalpara.para: When you're browsing the folder you want to export to in the &appname;'s export assistant you can't select it as the directory to export to. Instead you have to go to the directory a level up and select the directory you want to export to there.

sect2.title: Known limitations

formalpara.title: Execution mode
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, execution mode may be configured in &appname; but is not yet honored by known file-managers.

sect2.para: This concern working directory, execution mode, startup notification and execution's owner parameters.

formalpara.title: Suggested shortcut
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, suggested shortcut, as described in &desema; cannot be configured in &appname;, and is not honored by the menu plugin.
But, thanks to the tracker plugin, you are always able to define a shortcut at the desktop level, assigning this shortcut to the fma-run program, making it execute the action of your choice.

formalpara.title: Menu separator
formalpara.para: As of version 3.0, menu separators cannot be configured in &appname;, and are not honored by any known file-managers.
